name: Pixel Archer (FGLab Studio)
description:
Hello and welcome to my small project over here.

It was of my school thesis and I thought since I had a lot of fun making, why not publish it and see if any of you have some fun.

It's a very very basic highscore based shooting gallery but I hope you can have fun with it.

MAIN FEATURS:

  • -A shooting gallery  with increasing difficulty as you keep going
  • -Simple to aim with a mouse or touchscreen
  • -Highscores with name entry

I know it's very simple but I would be very thankful for any donations so I may follow my dreams and study physics starting this year. 

There is a working Android version in the works, I just have to implement the Highscore system and it will be uploaded too.

Hope you have fun!!!
